alert.note: Alert for Greer; Harmon (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Harmon and northwestern Greer Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 744 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southwest of Vinson, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vinson, Madge and McKnight. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
